Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

Reverb 2 Filter

Discussion

This filter is used to provide a higher quality and more smoothly decaying reverb. This filter is faster than Reverb 3, but slower than Reverb 1 (and much slower than the built-in, but somewhat low-quality, Miles reverb.

Preferences:

"Reverb Time": Duration of reverb. Range: 0.01 to 8000.0 milliseconds.

"Reverb Mix": Mix of reverb signal. Range: 0.00 (original - dry) to 1.0 % (fully reverb - wet).

"Reverb PreDelay": Pre-Delay before reverb. Range: 0.0 to 250.0 milliseconds.


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Sections: Reverb 1 Filter, Reverb 3 Filter
